entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Kestrel's Content-Length handling for 1xx, 204 and 205 responses and CONNECT requests #42956
  • Blazor startup before DOM Content Loaded leads to malformed component error #42954
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #42953
  • Perf improvement: updates #42952
  • Blazor server JSRuntime.Confirm() is causing page reload / connection-reset on waiting 10 minutes #42951
  • Don't log exception in exception handling middleware #42950
  • UrlHelperExtensions.ActionLink docs are misleading regarding requiring protocol and host #42949
  • [Feature Request] gRPC does not have HTTP protocol version negotiation in unencrypted environments #42948
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Scaffolding Identity breaks ApplicationDbContext #42947

Closed

  • Connection performance improvements #39846
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLogging Middleware #31863
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Duplicate registration in ServicesCollection on AspNetCore. #41530
  • Rename `AddEndpointFilter` to `AddEndpointFilterFactory` #42933
    7.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #42945
  • Output-caching should support tagged entries #40227
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching should support ETags #40226
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching can lock concurrent requests #40224
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching entries can vary by custom values #40223
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching imperative configuration #40222
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching declarative configuration #40221
    7.0-preview6
  • Document macOS OID change #42391
    7.0-preview7
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyIgnoresItsOwnDirectoryWithRelativePathSegmentWhenCopying #40059
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyE2EWorksWithOldFoldersPresent #40619
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeCanBeIgnoredInProcess #41207
    Test failures
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #42930
  • Parameters from body or forms should not be generated as OpenApiParameters #42483
    7.0-rc1
  • Trying to set ChannelPrefix for Redis SignalR Backplane but prefix is being ignored #42942

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing "Install PWA" button for published empty Blazor WebAssembly app #42955
    area-mvc, area-blazor

Merged

  • Bump terser from 5.14.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/Components/CustomElements/src/js #42847
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-rc1
  • Rename AddEndpointFilter to AddEndpointFilterFactory #42944
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Revert "Route tooling (#42597)" #42943
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix the code to ignore parameters from incorrect locations #42878
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Unquarantine some IIS tests #42932
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_PipeCaptureNativeLogs #42914
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • HTTP/3: Don't wait for writes to complete in sends #42683
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1907202 #42928
    area-mvc
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Add analyzer to suggest top level route registration #42937
    area-infrastructure
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Delay and Periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Add missing ConfigureAwait(false) to PolicyHttpMessageHandler #42940
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
